name: Dot Dash
description:
Try to survive against a relentless horde of dots! The more you kill, the faster you shoot!

Download for free!

How to play:
  • WASD or arrow keys to move, mouse to aim.
  • Your laser will fire automatically.
  • Coins give you +10 points.
  • Purple dots have two lives, blue dots move faster, orange dots explode when shot.
  • Press escape to pause.

Music: Love Of My Life by BoxCat Games, licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution License
